title: Acts of the Apostles (Christian Sermon)
description:
Acts of the Apostles part 1 (Christian Sermon)


Study on Acts of the Holy Spirit (part 1 of 5).

Part 1 --> Chapters 1 to 7
Part 2 --> Chapters 8 to 14
Part 3 --> Chapters 15 to 21
Part 4 --> Chapters 22 to 28
Part 5 --> Growth of Christianity in India and the whole World. 

Powerful Sermon on Prayer and the works of the Holy Spirit by Pastor Paul Thangiah. This is FGAG Church, Indiranagar, Bangalore. It is one of the biggest Churches in Bangalore with 22,000 in attendance on Sundays and with 10 services throughout the day in English, Tamil and Hindi languages. There is also live service flashed throughout India between 6.00 am to 1.00 pm on Sundays.

This church is unique in Bangalore because half of the people who attend the services today were not born in christian families; but have been touched by the power of the Holy Spirit and the Gospel of Jesus Christ and have converted to Christianity.

Runtime: 56 mins
Language: English
Year: Aug 2013
Quality: 8/10
Format: mp4 format 

"Don't ask me what Christ can do for you! He has done all he could. Tell me what you can do for Christ?"

Uploaded by Indian Christian
